EmailTemplate.subject: Discover: Martell Cordon Bleu Extra
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Martell Cordon Bleu introduces an extraordinary new expression of an icon
A lusciously smooth cognac, the brand-new Martell Cordon Bleu Extra is a supremely refined version of the 1912 classic Martell Cordon Bleu.
Rediscover this classic today, neat or on the rocks.
Get it shipped to your doorstep <[[https://thecask.my/shop/cognac/martell-cordon-bleu-extra/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
What is cognac, exactly?
You know the name, you love the drink, but have you ever wondered what cognac actually is? How does earth, climate, and expertise all come together to create this spirit we love?
WATCH: Ep. 1 of Cognac Essentials <[[https://www.martell.com/en-ww/cognac-essentials/what-is-cognac?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
Dine at DC Restaurant with us
On the latest episode of Chef on Chef, Chef Darren Chin crafted a scrumptious seven-course menu, paired with special Martell cocktails.
Two (2) couples will get to sample this very menu at DC Restaurant.
Find out how you can win <[[https://firstclasse.com.my/chef-on-chef-episode-4-dc-restaurant-welcomes-chef-evert-onderbeke/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
